titles.title: Uta no Prince-sama: Maji Love Revolutions
うたの☆プリンスさまっ♪ マジLOVEレボリューションズ
Utano Princesama: Revolutions
歌之王子殿下 真爱REVOLUTIONS

relatedanime.anime: Uta no Prince-sama: Maji Love Legend Star

anime.description: Haruka Nanami now works under Shining, the same agency with ST☆RISH and veteran idol group QUARTET NIGHT. With an upcoming international sports event looking for performers for its opening ceremony, fierce competitions between idols are surely expected. Source: ANN

externalentity.identifier: うたの☆プリンスさまっ♪

tag.name: original work
tag.description: What the anime is based on! This is given as the original work credit in the OP. Mostly of academic interest, but a useful bit of info, hinting at the possible depth of story.

tag.name: game
tag.description: Based on an interactive (even if minimally so) form of entertainment software, generally available for PCs, consoles or arcade machines.

character.name: Aijima Cecil
character.description: Aijima Cecil is the prince of Agnapolis, a country that`s far west.

episode.title: Innocent Wind
Innocent Wind
Innocent Wind
episode.summary: When Haruka arrives at the shooting location of an upcoming film starring Ai, his costars Natsuki and Syo describe the perfection of his acting. However, Ai is unable to understand one of his lines. Given his perfect performance, the others find this statement strange. That night they discover Ai`s greatest secret... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: EMOTIONAL LIFE
Emotional Life
Emotional Life
episode.summary: Shining puts together the Cross-Unit Project for STARISH. The first phase features a rock musical starring Otoya and Natsuki. Though they`re both overflowing with enthusiasm, they`re given unexpected roles. As they dive into rehearsal to master their roles, they find their enthusiasm gets them nowhere... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: GOLDEN☆STAR
Golden Star
Golden Star
episode.summary: When Shining refuses to enter STARISH in the Triple S concert, the members of STARISH trust in their potential and agree to work harder than they ever have before. Meanwhile, STARISH and NIGHT QUARTET head to a resort to film for a variety TV show. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: The dice are cast
The Dice Are Cast
The Dice Are Cast
episode.summary: Shining Agency`s idol group STARISH, composer Nanami Haruka, and senior idol group QUARTET NIGHT have been making steady progress expanding their field of activity. In the entertainment world, artists and idols are beginning to enter the selection process to become the opening act of "Super Star Sports," also known as Triple S. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ORIGINAL RESONANCE
Original Resonance
Original Resonance
episode.summary: Masato and Tokiya`s job for the final phase of the Cross-Unit Project is performing a new song live on an influential music program. With the hopes of STARISH and the entire Shining Agency riding on their shoulders, they tell Haruka they will write the song`s lyrics first. However, things don`t go as well as they hoped, and they find themselves getting stuck... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ONLY ONE
Only One
Only One
episode.summary: While working on his new solo song, Ranmaru increasingly devotes himself to his work with QUARTET NIGHT. However, Haruka and her friends sense Ranmaru is pushing himself too hard. Meanwhile, as Ranmaru gazes from a distance at the construction of the new Triple S stadium, nostalgic and bittersweet memories are on his mind... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Saintly Territory
Saintly Territory
Saintly Territory
episode.summary: Haruka`s new job is composing a new song for Camus, who is performing at the opening ceremony of the Shining Tower. To learn more about him, Haruka asks to accompany Camus to work, and he agrees on one condition. Will Haruka be able to write a song to satisfy Camus, who is perfect in every way...?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Code:T.V.U
Code: T.V.U
Code: T.V.U
episode.summary: For Cross-Unit Project phase two, Ren, Syo, and Cecil are tasked with producing a smart phone commercial. However, all three insist on their own idea and can`t manage to agree. Haruka is worried about the boys, and the deadline approaches ruthlessly... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: エボリューション・イヴ
Evolution Eve
Evolution Eve
episode.summary: When Shining acknowledges STARISH`s revolution when they spur QUARTET NIGHT into action, he allows them to enter the Triple S opening artist screening concert. Viewing STARISH as their greatest rivals, QUARTET NIGHT makes a request to Haruka in preparation for the concert. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: サンキュ
Thank You
Thank You
episode.summary: The Cross-Unit Projects concludes with great success. Though the international focus on them is growing, STARISH still hasn`t received an answer regarding whether or not they`ll be entered. When they hear the high quality of QUARTET NIGHT`s new song, the anxiety they feel without Haruka peaks. However, the time they`ve spent together since the birth of STARISH leads them to a certain conclusion. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Answer
Answer
Answer
episode.summary: As QUARTET NIGHT prepares for the Triple S opening artist screening concert, they head off on a trip with Haruka to work on their song. Shining Saotome`s orders are to create a "number one song that will make them shine." However, the members of QUARTET NIGHT have never worked with a songwriter to compose a song before. With no precedent to lean on, what kind of song with they produce...? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: NEVER...
Never...
Never...
episode.summary: Reiji, a man capable of completing any job flawlessly, is the Shining Agency`s busiest idol. Haruka visits him between jobs to hold meetings with him. As they spend time alone together in his car and under gazebos at night, Haruka draws closer to his true nature hidden behind his smile... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: マジLOVEレボリューションズ
Maji Love Revolutions
Maji Love Revolutions
episode.summary: After QUARTET NIGHT`s masterful performance, STARISH rushes onto the stage they`ve dreamed of performing on to challenge their rivals and deliver their voices to the world. Together the idol groups STARISH and QUARTET NIGHT have started a revolution of love, but an unexpected development waits for them in the final moments of the concert... Source: crunchyroll
